title: Vaibhavi Diamond Haaram Set with Emerald Accents and Pearl Drops
materials: 18K White Gold with High-Quality Cubic Zirconia
and South Sea Pearls. Meticulously handcrafted with Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: This exquisite Haaram features an intricate floral design meticulously set with dazzling Cubic Zirconia. Emerald accents punctuate the neckline, adding a touch of regal elegance. Delicate South Sea pearl drops grace the bottom, enhancing its traditional charm. The accompanying Jhumka earrings echo the Haaram's design, creating a perfectly balanced set. The craftsmanship showcases delicate filigree work.
colors: Primarily white (Cubic Zirconia) and gold (18k White Gold)
with vibrant green (Emeralds) and creamy white (Pearls).
occasions: and other special occasions. Ideal for brides seeking a blend of tradition and modern elegance or for attending a Seemantham (baby shower) or half-saree function with grace and sophistication.
description: This Diamond Haaram set embodies timeless South Indian elegance. The intricate craftsmanship, combined with the sparkle of Cubic Zirconia and the richness of Emeralds, makes it a statement piece. Its versatility allows it to be worn with both traditional and contemporary attire. The set's durability ensures it will be treasured for generations. The use of high-quality materials and meticulous craftsmanship ensures lasting beauty and value.
